settings.heading: Our Happiness Guarantee
settings.textarea:
We want you to be totally thrilled with your Cover-Up products. If you're not happy with your purchase for any
reason, opened or unopened products can be returned for a refund or a store credit for a full 60 days after you order.

settings.title: Not What You Expected?
settings.text: We use the best of what nature has to offer - from wood, stone, seashell and merino wool to make products that will last for the long haul.

settings.title: We'll Replace or Exchange Your Items If They're:
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to tell a story, explain a detail about your product, or describe a new promotion.
